Window.zoomNumer

機能/意味
Layer magnification (numerator)
タイプ
Windowクラスのプロパティ (読み書き可能)
説明
　Represents the numerator of the layer magnification. For the time being, you can set the value, but use the Window.setZoom method to set the value.
　The denominator is represented by the Window.zoomDenom property.
　See the Window.setZoom methods for details.
参照
Window.setZoom
Window.zoomDenom
